_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
sn55.7:1.4+sn55.7:1.9^who_else_mentioned: Gotama, Sakyan, Saṅgha, Buddha, Māras, Brahmās
sn55.7:1.4+sn55.7:1.9: brahmins and householders of Bamboo Gate
sn55.7:2.2+sn55.7:2.4: brahmins and householders of Bamboo Gate
sn55.7:3.3: brahmins and householders of Bamboo Gate
before^sn55.7:3.3^where: the land of the Kosalans, Bamboo Gate
where: the land of the Kosalans, Bamboo Gate
sn55.7:12.2+sn55.7:12.4: brahmins and householders of Bamboo Gate
